text: Probability mass function 0.40 0.35 0.30 z 025 ! 02 & 0.15 a 0.10 o Q S - e " b -- 00 Sa > nn 0005 5 10 15 20 k The horizontal axis is the index K, the number of occurrences. A is the expected rate of occurrences. The vertical axis is the probability of k occurrences given A. The function is defined only at integer values of k; the connecting lines are only guides for the eye.
